episodes.title: Uriah Wesman Survives Three Cults
episodes.description: #342 This week we had a conversation with comedian and storyteller Uriah Wesman. Uriah grew up in 3 cults by the time he was 14. We talk about cult vs religion, crisis of faith, mental health, the "charismatic leader", and what it takes to shed a cult mentality. Oddly enough Raytheon and Sir Lancelot comes up. You can see Uriah's one man show "Three Cults Walk Into A Bar" at the Lyric Hyperion in Los Angeles on May 11th. Follow him on IG @uriahjokes and here on YT @UriahWesman for more details. https://patreon.com/NoneTakenPod?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator&utm_content=join_link --- Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/none-taken/support
